Hello.

May I ask what is the script or command to check if the sheet is present or not?

Thanks.

Roggie

$exists = $objPHPExcel->sheetNameExists('Worksheet 1');

    /**
     * Check if a sheet with a specified name already exists
     *
     * @param  string $pSheetName  Name of the worksheet to check
     * @return boolean
     */
Thank you for your command. It seems to be working ok in my program. Thank you.

    $exists = $objPHPExcel->sheetNameExists('Worksheet1');
    if ($exists) {
        printf "Worksheet exists"); 
    } else {
        printf "Worksheet does not exist");
